name: I Want Eat Soup: Soup (Soup)
description:
Soup (Our original upload was deleted for some reason so here it is again)

Some features weren't supported by webGL so here is a downloadable build with all features (created after the deadline): https://github.com/Bryanjlz/Soup/releases/tag/1.0

Code and Art: Berriis, Altheflyer, Kervina
